name: Crypt Spider
description: The Crypt Spider is a Medium beast with exceptional dexterity and cunning, often dwelling in dark, web-infested areas.
memorable: Notable for its ability to paralyze prey and create zombie spiders, creating a fearsome combination for adventurers.
goals: Typically seeks to ensnare and dominate its prey, using webs and stealth.
relations: May be encountered alongside other spiders or undead creatures created by its 'Create Zombie' ability.
environment: Commonly found in dark, web-filled locales, such as caves or abandoned buildings.
strengths: Possesses high dexterity and stealth capabilities, making it a formidable ambusher.
weaknesses: Lacks magical abilities and has relatively low hit points compared to other creatures of similar challenge rating.
attacks: Employs a bite that inflicts piercing damage and possible paralysis; also uses webbing to restrain foes.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to create a zombie swarm from spiders, adding pressure to combat encounters.
senses: Has blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to detect creatures in darkness when in contact with its webs.
skills: Proficient in stealth, allowing it to ambush its prey effectively.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition.
Can cocoon restrained targets for easier capture.
Moves effortlessly through webs without restriction.
Utilizes web sense to detect prey in its territory.
Can create a swarm of zombie spiders as an additional threat.
test_queries: agile predatory spider in dark areas
